sentences.en: A pH test measures the acidity or alkalinity of a substance.
sentences.cn: pH值测试可检测物质的酸碱度。

sentences.en: A positive pregnancy test soon confirmed her intuitive feelings.
sentences.cn: 阳性孕检结果很快证实了她的直觉。

sentences.en: Boxing is a test of skill and technique, rather than brute strength.
sentences.cn: 拳击考验的是技能和技术，不是蛮力。

sentences.en: Did you get a good mark in the test?
He suggested a link between class size and test results of seven-year-olds.
sentences.cn: 他认为7岁大的学生的测试分数和班级的规模有关系。

sentences.en: He was once described as a fussily accurate test pilot.
sentences.cn: 他一度被称为过分讲究精准的试飞员。

sentences.en: Out of a total of 2,602 pupils only 922 passed the test.
sentences.cn: 所有2,602名学生中，只有922名通过了测试。

sentences.en: So far 57 have taken the test and all have been negative.
sentences.cn: 到目前为止，参加测试的有57人，测试结果均呈阴性。

sentences.en: Sooner or later, life will put the relationship to the test.
sentences.cn: 总有一天，生活会考验这种关系是否牢固。

sentences.en: Such a motion is considered a test of backbench opinion.
sentences.cn: 这样的动议被视为对后座议员立场的考验。

sentences.en: The ability to work collaboratively is a true test of leadership.
sentences.cn: 与人合作的能力是对领导能力的一种真正检验。

sentences.en: The athlete received a two-year suspension following a positive drug test.
sentences.cn: 该运动员因尿检结果呈阳性而被停赛两年。

sentences.en: The children have to sit a tough selection test.
sentences.cn: 孩子们必须参加一次严格的选拔测试。

sentences.en: The Liverpool team are now putting their theory to the test.
sentences.cn: 利物浦队此时正在验证他们的理论。

sentences.en: The success of wind power represents a litmus test for renewable energy.
sentences.cn: 风能作为动力的成功是对可再生能源一次立见分晓的检验。

sentences.en: The vote was seen as a test run for elections to come.
sentences.cn: 这次投票被看作是即将到来的选举的预演。

words.tran_cn: 经受过考验的；经验定的
测验；考查；受考验（test的ing形式）

phrases.tran_cn: 现场试验；实地操作试验
经得起时间的考验（或检验等）
测试设备；试验设备；检测设备
在…身上做实验；在…做实验；对…进行测试
试纸；测验试卷；供检定笔迹的文件

trans.tran_en: a set of questions, exercises, or practical activities to measure someone’s skill, ability, or knowledge

trans.tran_cn: 试验， 测试； 检验
trans.tran_en: a set of questions, exercises, or practical activities to measure someone’s skill, ability, or knowledge

trans.tran_cn: 测试， 考查， 试验
trans.tran_en: a set of questions, exercises, or practical activities to measure someone’s skill, ability, or knowledge
to examine a substance or thing in order to find out its qualities or what it contains

trans.tran_cn: 受试验，受测验，受考验，测得结果
